nodes.text: The Apalis Coast was a rich green flatland on Alderaan located south of the Juran Mountains. It was separated from the sea by a sheer cliff face. The Apalis Coast was the ancestral homeland of House Organa and was a reliable source of wealth for them, as the noble family turned the region into productive farmland.
During the Alderaan Civil War, House Thul invaded the Apalis Coast following a failed attack on Castle Organa, digging up the Organa farms and entrenching themselves there.
